website_summaries.verdict: Rejuvenating oil made from cold-pressed rosehips, which treats several skin problems and conditions.
pros: Cold-pressed process for purer, more potent product
Helps treat and improve appearance of sun-damaged skin, age spots, scars, dermatitis, eczema, psoriasis
Bottled in amber glass to preserve freshness and potency
Made from Chilean rosehip, contains powerful and protective antioxidants
cons: Although typical of every topical product, a certain small percentage of purchasers had a bad reaction to the ingredients, didn't like the "earthy" smell, or didn't see the results they expected

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. My 58 year old skin has really responded to using this in the morning and evening. It moisturizes very well....and I fancy I look a little bit younger to boot. My 27 year old daughter also loves it and says it clears up her skin if she gets the odd breakout. My 19 year old son has also used it to soothe razor rash on his neck and it worked like a charm. What's not to like? I'm back ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: Tomboysuze

customer_reviews.title: Had been using pure rose oil + coconut oil to ...
customer_reviews.text: Had been using pure rose oil + coconut oil to get rid of dark spots and scarring in chin area for several months then heard about rose hip oil and tried this brand. Within 10 days I noticed a big difference. 9 months later -- i switched to the Jarosa brand because they had a good sale and it has the pump bottle which works better for me than the dropper. I keep mine inside the fridge door so to just open the fridge and do 1 pump is so convenient. I keep the above dropper bottle now for travel. Pretty much all the brands are probably good but its the pump bottle that I'm sold on.
customer_reviews.author: Im Scarlet

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Oil for your face!
customer_reviews.text: Just received this product. It is truly lovely. It doesn't leave a greasy look to my face as it absorbs quickly. I'm even using it during the day. You only need 2-3 drops, and I combine it with a 100% Argan Oil to apply AM and PM. My skin feels lovely and I am hoping I will notice a difference in tone and keeping the wrinkles away that are starting to pop up around my eyes and lips. I tried a different Rosehip oil previously, I found it sticky -this is a beautiful oil - I will purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: cardelltribe

customer_reviews.title: I really love this product
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I really love this product! My skin is really oily as it is but my sister recommended rose hip oil, and this brand and price was so great so I gave it a shot. So glad I did. Not only is it not greasy on my already very oily skin, but the scent is light and it feels great. Your skin will absorb it really quickly which is great for those rushed mornings! I highly recommend buying this! The company also has great customer service which is always a plus! :)
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Harris

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: I noticed it worked immediately. Only improves with daily use. I'm 66 and perfect skin. Only slight rosacea left. After I waxed my face was red and sore . Immediately this took out redness and skin has a glow to it now as well. Definitely if not the best..one of the best. I've also used Christina Moss's products. They're excellent as well. But I like this better right now. Her face cream does relieve bags and healed my blister under my nose immediately. However I think this one worked faster. Loved this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Jill E Peacock

customer_reviews.title: This oil is the best! In just three months it lightened up the ...
customer_reviews.text: This oil is the best! In just three months it lightened up the dark spots my last pregnancies gave me. My skin is softer, has a nice glow, less wrinkles and my eyelashes and eyebrows are thicker and fuller! Also the skin of my hands and the nails have improved drastically! I just started my second bottle and I will continue buying! Thanks for the great products and prieces!
customer_reviews.author: erosnalex

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL PRODUCT!!
customer_reviews.text: After using this product for one week, I began to see significant changes in skin discoloration and dry lines. My skin felt and looked hydrated but not greasy. My skin literally drank in this serum. I keep it in the refrigerator and I use it mainly at night but I sometimes add a few drops in the morning to my moisturizer. I truly believe its helping my aging skin and will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Sonji

customer_reviews.title: good customer support
customer_reviews.text: I hate that this didn't appear to work for me because they're customer service was so nice. They contacted me right away, answered any questions, tried to find solutions at all cost. I just didn't see enough results to say, this is a keeper. It may have helped some but no distinct difference, not even in the eyelashes as it's been reported. I think it made my eyes water. It wasn't my salvation unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Miss D

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a long way!
customer_reviews.text: I have Rosehip oil for years and this product is very nice, it has no smell and a little goes a long away. I use it twice a day, I mix it in my daytime moisturizer and use it straight up at nite. I have noticed my skin has I proved using this product, looks much better and has a lot more moisture in my face and let's just say as we age our skin gets dryer! Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Eshleman

customer_reviews.title: Love this oil
customer_reviews.text: Love this oil! I'm a cancer patient and some of the drugs I am taking have weakened my fingernails and caused them to split. There are supplements that address this but they require months to have any effect, I needed something to deal with the splitting right now. The oil prevents splitting after just a few days use, although the nails are still weak and thin, they are much improved! I also like it to use on my hair to make it shine, now that I have kinky hair after growing out after losing it from chemo. It's also great on my aging skin, reducing the fine lines and "crepe paper" effect.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product. It has done wonders for my 55-year ...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. It has done wonders for my 55-year old skin! I will order it again. I really appreciate the fact that this is a cruelty free product.
customer_reviews.author: Mary S

customer_reviews.title: My skin is so soft and moisturized
customer_reviews.text: what pleases me most of this oil is that with a little I can apply to my entire face, and with a light massage on my face all over my skin so completely adsorbed , there is no oil residue , but my skin is hydrated all day. has a slightly odd smell fishy at first but then when this absorbs disappears. my skin is so soft and moisturized now
customer_reviews.author: Ana Jacquelinne Bueno Perez

customer_reviews.title: Liking It So Far!
customer_reviews.text: The product works well. As the other reviews say, I have noticed that my lashes are getting longer (I bought the product for that main purpose), but I also don't notice my acne scars lightening very much. However, I've only used it for a little over a week, so I can't say if it is working yet. The product has a strong smell. It caught me by surprise, honestly. It smelled not very pleasant, but it is organic, so I can't argue with it. Overall, the product is great. I normally use about 3-4 drops in the palm of my hand and I don't find that it dries or absorbs to quickly. I like the product!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: they are just small and red) and the scars on my cheeks are getting better. I'm actually looking forward to the effect on ...
customer_reviews.text: the rosehip oil did help with acnes and acne scars! the acnes on my forehead are much lighter now(they are not the hard, oozing ones, they are just small and red) and the scars on my cheeks are getting better. I'm actually looking forward to the effect on my eyelashes, yes i read the previous reviews! and now my face does not feel dry after clarisonic face brush. it's just one thing, the tube does not seem good. it can not hold the oil
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: "Love it... my boyfriend has some sort of dermatitis on his leg and I've been applying your organic rosewater and then the rosehip oil for about 2 weeks and it's actually healing! Probably be gone in another week or two. I gave a bottle to a friend who has eczema on her hand... it's helping her too!"
customer_reviews.author: AttitudeIsEverything

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: It smelled old when I received it... I probably should have sent it back. I've used it and can't really tell if there's any difference. If it has an "old oil smell" send it back.
customer_reviews.author: angeleverlast

customer_reviews.title: In LOVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with it! It's made a huge difference in my skin! It's my favorite product of yours! I love it because I'm in Colorado which is a dry climate. It keeps my skin hydrated. I feel like my skin has a dewy/glowing look to it after I apply it! It helps with my fine lines too.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: satisfied with this one
customer_reviews.text: after the eczema left me a lot of scars, i have been trying a lot of things to get rid off the scars. I found out that the rosehip oil is the best thing for that when I used this one. After applying rosehip oil on scars both on my arms, legs, and back, I could see the different in a few weeks. I just bought another brand to use but i dont think that one worked on scars, plus the color of that one was clear. The color of this brand is what the rosehip oil should be like. I will buy it again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Namon

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: I add it to my daily face moisturizer and it definitely keeps my skin hydrated and soft without clogging my pores. Those are the improvements I've see so far, hopefully over time it will continue improving my skin in other ways. I will most likely be ordering it again when I run out and even sent the link to the website for my mom to buy a bottle as well. I'm very happy with the product, it was exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: shannon jolly

customer_reviews.title: I really enjoy using this
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy using this, my dark marks on my face are lighting up with any costly methods. I use after each shower or when I wash my face. '
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Rivera

customer_reviews.title: The best Organic Rosehip Oil Ever
customer_reviews.text: Skin Daily Skincare Solutions Organic 100% Rosehip Oil is the best I've tried. This is the last product I use before going to bed on my dark spots from acne. When I wake up my skin just glows, and looks better each day. It also helps with growing eyebrows, eyelashes, and healing fingernail cuticles. Nevertheless, I use it on my itchy scalp when nothing else will work. I can't say enough good things about this product. Just try not to run out of it, or you will see a difference right away.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gates

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to use and the price is reasonable
customer_reviews.text: This oil is fabulous for my aging skin. I have ordered it several times because it works. I have also tried other brands, and this one stands out in quality. My eye area is softer and so are my wrinkles. It is easy to use and the price is reasonable.

customer_reviews.text: This stuff does wonders!! My eczema got really bad. I put it on 2 times a day!! Thank God for products like this. I'm no longer itchy.

customer_reviews.title: Also my hair was itching like crazy and I put a few drops of the ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it and I must say my skin feels smoother and looks more radiant. Also my hair was itching like crazy and I put a few drops of the oil on my scalp and massaged it in and the itching stopped. I like it and a few drops go a long way. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Ms. CiCi

customer_reviews.title: Didn't make me break out and seems like a great alternative to expensive moisturizers I've tried
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight option for moisturizer. Didn't make me break out and seems like a great alternative to expensive moisturizers I've tried.

customer_reviews.title: i have never been more satisfied with a product
customer_reviews.text: I have been ordering this product for months now. every single time i start to run out i immediately order more. i have never been more satisfied with a product! this product works miracles!! i have acne and scars on my face and even after the first use i noticed a difference. i have found that rubbing the product deep into your skin before bed is the best method. i am extremely happy!

customer_reviews.text: I love this name brand. Unfortunately, my skin developed red patches after first use.

People are starting to comment. Seriously. My skin is incredibly soft, bright and lines and wrinkles have been visibly reduced. Ill never use another brand again. This stuff is the real deal.

customer_reviews.title: The Product Works, Stick With It
customer_reviews.text: The rosehip oil is working wonders for me. I have added it to my daily regimen and have seen reduction in oil and breakouts. I found that two drops isn't enough for me. I have virtually replaced my moisturizer with this product + rose water. Note: At first I experienced what seemed like in increase in breakouts. It was the oil doing some deep cleaning! Now things are all good.

customer_reviews.title: "I love it. I have already bought 5 or 6 ...
customer_reviews.text: "I love it. I have already bought 5 or 6 bottles from you. I have noticed improvements in my skin. Dark blemishes have faded, small lines have faded or are now non existent and I have only been using the Rosehip oil for a couple of months, if that!"

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE it! I enjoy the scent (woodsy) and it's ...
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE it! I enjoy the scent (woodsy) and it's very absorbent. I use it on my upper face and eyelashes. Lashes seem to be lusher, which was unexpected, and I love the moisturizing effect of the rose hip oil. i use it on my cuticles, which makes my nails longer and the ends of my hair.
customer_reviews.author: A.Boulet

customer_reviews.title: Rose oil? Or magic in a bottle.
customer_reviews.text: I love the organic rose hip oil. At first i wasn't sure about buying beauty related products on Ebay. Im so glad i did. It left my skin feeling so soft. And surprisingly enough i never break out from this rose oil. I highly recommend this product.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and as advertised. Great product for the price, girlfriend loves it for her skin. Will keep ordering again.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: What a great product! I use this rosehip oil daily and my skin has improved quite dramatically. Little by little, my wrinkles and creases are diminishing. It's not an overnight miracle...............you have to be patient. I'm still quite impressed with my results so far. I don't use it at night because it's a bit oily, but during the day, either alone or under my makeup, it works very well. Now I'm going to start using it on the back of my hands and see if I see any obvious results on the age spots. I will keep you posted! but, so far, this product rates 5 stars............thank you very much!
customer_reviews.author: cj hart

customer_reviews.title: I love the Rosehip oil and use it on my face ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the Rosehip oil and use it on my face every night after using the Skin Daily Rosewater. The Rosehip oil absorbs quickly, leaving my skin soft, not oily.

customer_reviews.title: The other product i ordered and used was not as good. I've never written a review but this product ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this for a few months and co-worker asked me what I was using on my skin, specifically my neck. The only different product I was using was this Rose-hip Oil. When i went to reorder, yours was unavailable. The other product i ordered and used was not as good. I've never written a review but this product was worth it.

customer_reviews.title: Great for face!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't remove sun/age spots, but my 70 YO face looks amazing!

customer_reviews.title: you gotta try this!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome... Does not smell like roses because it's not! It's rose hip oil.. And if you have ever eaten a rosehip this smells just like it. I love the earthy aroma and all the good stuff hidden in rose hips and this oil! Absorbs almost instantly into your skin. This is one product I will order again and again!

customer_reviews.title: I love how this feels on my skin
customer_reviews.text: I bought another bottle. I love how this feels on my skin, my skin seems to beg for it. I am not flaking off dry skin as I usually do in the winter.

customer_reviews.text: The oil has improved my skin. Tone is better and lines less noticeable. Very pleased. Absorbs very well, not greasy.

customer_reviews.text: You can feel a difference in your skin after just a few uses. I am very please with this product.

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for stretch marks.
customer_reviews.text: Used this for my stretch marks. Finished the bottle and they are still as red and big as ever.

customer_reviews.text: Great service, great product. Makes my skin feel like silk. I haven't used long enough to see long term results but all n all ,I will reorder this product.

customer_reviews.text: I am so excited about this product. It leaves my skin smooth, bright, and helps soften the hard lines of wrinkles. It is a light oil with a pleasant, nutty scent. Several drops go a long way. You can almost feel it working on your skin. I look forward to results over a longer time frame.

customer_reviews.text: I love how this felt on my skin and I received it quickly.

customer_reviews.title: I am using it and I like it very much
customer_reviews.text: I am using it and I like it very much. Thank you for such a wonderful product and such good service. I have noticed subsequent to purchasing the Rosehip oil how rare it is to find quality as good as yours. After using this product for two weeks, after cleansing morning and evening, I notice a distinct difference in my skin. The tone is much improved, as are fine lines. The deeper lines around the mouth have become much softer and less noticeable. I would definitely recommend this product to anyone looking for an effective and affordable skin care product.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this oil
customer_reviews.text: Loving this product. Mixes in well with my night moisturizer and leaves my skin so soft! Highly recommend this oil!

customer_reviews.text: I love this oil! I've used it for over a month now and see some great benefits to my skin, it's smoother, silkier and hydrated. I've used a few other Rosehip oils in the past, the quality of this one far surpasses all others. You'll immediately notice the difference!

customer_reviews.title: I love this product!

customer_reviews.text: I love, love how this Rosehip serum feels on my face. I can definitely tell the difference after using it more than a week! I can definitely tell the earthy smell, but it will dissipate fast (once it is absorbed in your skin). The seller is very nice and she emailed me the literature and explanation of the normal earthy smell of the rosehip and its benefits for your skin. I really love it! Go ahead and try.

customer_reviews.title: but smells better after you let is diffuse a bit

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil, a little goes a long way!

customer_reviews.text: This Organic Rosehip Oil is amazing! I keep it refrigerated and apply it every morning, at first I had a few break-outs but since has cleared and skin feels great. It really helps with the morning puffiness under eyes and I use it for my nails as well.

customer_reviews.title: Great oil !
customer_reviews.text: I have been mixing 2 drops of the oil with my daily moisturizer before applying. I love the way it makes my skin feel and how it stays moist throughout the day. I have only been using this product for a short while. Great product!

customer_reviews.title: ... it on a few times because it stinks so bad like fish
customer_reviews.text: I have tried using this product for months I can only put it on a few times because it stinks so bad like fish. People even remark what is that smell when I have it on I would recommend that you not buy this. I understand that pure rose solution smells fishy but I do not understand how people actally wear it.... unfortunately I waited too long to get my money returned. I was not able to take care of the return due to health issues.
customer_reviews.author: Loyal Customer since 2005

customer_reviews.title: Fishy smell
customer_reviews.text: Terrible fishy smell. Despite a reviewers comment in the Q&A section that the fish smell will go away, I have not had that experience. Unfortunately missed the 30 day return window, hoping the smell would improve. I do not recommend this product unless you don't mind smelling like fish if you apply it to your skin, even in small amounts.
customer_reviews.author: Scott S.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: did not do anything. I was told to buy another bottle.
customer_reviews.author: amazon buyer

customer_reviews.title: IMPRESSIVE
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this on a whim after reading reviews. Glad I did! I had done battle with some rose bushes and they won, my hands were shredded :-[ I have been applying the rosehip oil to my hands to see if it helped with the sun damage (and it is :-) ...BUT... to my amazement the scratches were healing much faster where I had applied the product-Impressive, right? Also use this on my face and eyelashes with great results :-D The product has an earthy "fragrance" but it does dissipate. Use this with Skin Daily Niacinamide Vitamin B3 Cream Serum twice daily. LOVE the product and the company/ customer service is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Used this twice, then got rid of it, couldn't stand the smell and makes the lines on skin look worse . It was waste of money for me because it also has an orange color that sink into the lines. Don't waste your money, also smell like fish not a pleasing smell to put on your face. Will not purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: mw

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is working great so far. My skin was dry and peeling, and I tried all sorts of face creams and nothing worked. I used this twice a day (morning and night) for a couple of months, and my skin stopped peeling. I use it just at night now, and my skin is so much better. No more peeling! It looks greasy at first, but it absorbs quickly. The smell is light when you put it on and then disappears. I am very sensitive to smell, and this brand does not bother me at all. I keep it in the fridge to keep it fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgette

customer_reviews.title: I really love this oil
customer_reviews.text: I really love this oil! I was a huge fan of coconut oil but hated how long it took to absorb before I went to bed. This oil is fast absorbing and makes me skin so smooth! I mainly bought this product to help fade my acne dark marks and I saw improvement immediately. It does have an earthy smell but as someone who loves strong tea and natural scents it didn't bother me.
customer_reviews.author: sakura

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and Immediate Results
customer_reviews.text: Yes and I love it! I noticed an immediate improvement in the hydration and texture but the improvement to fine and not so fine lines especially around my mouth was amazing! I thought "let's wait and see" if it's just a reaction to a new product. Two weeks later and my skin keeps getting better. I use it all over my face, neck and décolletage, even around my eyes and lashes! My lashes seem to be getting thicker and longer! Sometimes I'll layer it with other serums and creams and sometimes use it alone after a spray of rose water. It's a terrific serum and I'm a fan!"
customer_reviews.author: darian robin

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this but I keep it in the refrigerator and it is not as convenient as I hoped. It has a small odor that is not exactly pleasant and I like to use it at night and the fridge is on the other side of the house so I don't use it as often as I want. I am usually trying to get to bed in a small amount of time! I need to work on scheduling my time better!
customer_reviews.author: Cherry Sue

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME! If has a slight odor but it smells ...
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME! If has a slight odor but it smells earthy not fishy at all... doesn't bother me and the amount of hydration if delivers I don't care what it smells like. I won't use any other moisturizer. Soaked in and my makeup went on flawlessly... I did wait to apply makeup for 10 minutes. I plan to lather this stuff on my entire body as we have pretty harsh winters in WI. I will never go without it. I also added a drop to my mascara so fingers crossed my eyelashes will start growing!!! Thank you!~
customer_reviews.author: Jill.V

customer_reviews.title: My first impression, which I will update in a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: I JUST got this, today, so the review is a tad bit premature, BUT - I love: * The color of it - orange * The smell of it - fresh, earthy and pungent - not fishy, at all. * The way it simply melts into my skin, with no greasy residue. After I used it, I refrigerated it, as it recommends on the bottle. I shall update this, after I have used it awhile, but my first impression is extremely positive.
customer_reviews.author: Always Looking for the TruthTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: True Rose-hip oil! I searched and searched and this is the real deal. I am not being paid. This is an honest review from a normal customer that purchased the product. Yes, it will smell a bit like fish oil and that is a positive sign of a true product. Yes, it has an orange-ish color and that is also a positive sign. I keep my in the refrigerator and use it alone it with other essential oils. My skin feels & looks amazing after approximately one week of use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil! I just started using it, but already I'm seeing a difference. I'm using it on my neck and chest as well as a booster to my eye cream. I have not experienced any breakouts at all. Since I'm typically prone to breakouts, I've been a bit conservative in using it all over my face. But so far, so good! I use it on my hands as well. Great oil!
customer_reviews.author: lori j

customer_reviews.title: AMAZINGGGG!!
customer_reviews.text: This rosehip oil is really amazing! I have been using it for a Lil over 2 weeks and it has completely transformed my skin.The consistency is really nice:not oily at all,and it sinks into the skin beautifully. It has also plumped up my skin and is gradually evening out my skin tone
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No results !!
customer_reviews.text: Since I didn't see any results after buying one bottle of this oil, I'd gave it another try with a second one. After finishing it, I'm not noticing any improvement on my expression lines. Unfortunately, this product didn't work for me as I expected based on the ad and some reviews. Wish you luck w it!
customer_reviews.author: Herbalist

customer_reviews.title: I am in Love!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE LOVE LOVE this oil! I have been using this for approximately 2 weeks and my skin is dewey and soft. It does not make your skin oily. I mix with a blend of Meadofoam, apricot seed oil, and essential oils. Rose hip is a must have in a good anti aging blend! I use it by its self at night and I wake up glowing! Super fast shipping from this seller. Out standing service and a fantastic product!
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: I mainly wanted to see if it would help stimulate hair growth for my eyelashes like the other reviews said it did for them
customer_reviews.text: Stumbling upon this oil and reading reviews,I had wanted to try it.Not only for myself,but my husband who has eczema.He has seen slight difference in his skin condition and as for me,I mainly wanted to see if it would help stimulate hair growth for my eyelashes like the other reviews said it did for them,but no difference for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jojo

customer_reviews.title: Rose Hip Oil for a Rosy Complexion
customer_reviews.text: I'm.. 60 and take care of my skin, but, this product is fabulous! It has minimized my pores and refined the texture in such a short time. It absorbs well and doesn't look greasy. The smell doesn't bother me, I apply it over my witch hazel/rose water toner.
customer_reviews.author: GoldenGirl

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Oil
customer_reviews.text: This Rosehip oil is wonderful. Love the feel and scent on my skin, and I am seeing some slight lightening in dark spots. I will continue to use, as I enjoy massaging on my face and neck, and in conjunction with my moisturizer, my skin has become less dry.
customer_reviews.author: anne

customer_reviews.title: This oil will be a part of my skincare routine for life!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for your email. I am very satisfied with the rosehip oil, superior to what I had been using (and I was happy with that product). Even with just two days use I'm seeing a difference in my skin - it's like drinking water on a really hot day. My skin, especially my hands, feels hydrated and smoother. The crepey look and feel of my hands get better each time I apply your rosehip oil.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Priss

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. Will update in 21 days to make sure it's working with religious use.
customer_reviews.author: Posh

customer_reviews.title: great product and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: great product and great customer service. Im using it for new scars and it works great. Nice moisturizer for all over face as well. I'm still using, on my 3rd bottle. Great for most skin types, not greasy. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: GJH

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Oil
customer_reviews.text: Although it has an unpleasant scent I loved this product! I have oily skin and it worked great on my skin, I would use it as my night time skincare routine and wake up with glowing skin. Big thumbs up. #LOVE
customer_reviews.author: Edmarys

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product. It does not require just a drop ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. It does not require just a drop but a drop on each part of the face. Even though I have very dry skin, It hydrates it for quite a while. It's worth buying
customer_reviews.author: Anna P

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff has helped my skin so much. It softens and helps stop breakouts!!
customer_reviews.author: Cheekybaby

customer_reviews.title: "I have been using it and I love it!
customer_reviews.text: "I have been using it and I love it!! It does seem to take like 5 drops versus the 2-3 on the bottle to cover the face but its working great."
customer_reviews.author: Lauren McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Life Changing Product
customer_reviews.text: This product is magnificent from every angle. I use it nightly on my face before applying moisturizer. This oil makes my face look refreshed and vibrant the next day, regardless of how much sleep I have had or not had! On the odd occasion that I do not apply it, you can see it my face the next day, my tone is blotchy and skin uneven. The seller is reliable, professional and ordering is an ease. I cannot imagine a day when I don't use this wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: Louise

customer_reviews.title: I don't think is good for your face
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving 4 stars because made my face all dry, I don't think is good for your face. Anyway My nails are looking every day better, no kidding, just a little bit of oil after shower and helps a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Sol Romano

product_meta.title: Skin Daily Skincare Solutions Organic Rosehip Oil, 1 fl. oz.
product_meta.description: 100% pure organic rosehip oil in its pure form, rosehip oil is among the most powerful regenerating and rejuvenating skin oils in existence. Our rosehip oil starts life from the wild rose plants of Chile's southern Andes. A beautiful lush climate, mountains covered in mist, a climate and region perfect for producing Chile's real national treasure... ...Pure rosehip oil. The benefits of rosehip oil have long been know by the indigenous people of Chile, but until recently remained a secret to much of the rest of the world. How you can benefit from rosehip oil a potent antioxidant, pure rosehip oil firms, restores, and hydrates damaged and irregular skin. Making it hard to find previous scars and fading age and sun spots from the skin. What does this mean for your skin? Scars heal faster, sun damage and age spots disappear from the skin... ...And... ...Stretch marks fade away rosehip oil is also extremely effective in treating eczema, psoriasis, dermatitis, acne scars, brittle nails and dry hair. Dandruff? Add a few drops daily and massaging into your scalp. Why our rosehip oil is the best our rosehip oil is rosehip oil in its purest form. 100% pure Chilean rosehip seeds, cold-pressed to preserve potency and freshness. We produced our rosehip oil in micro-batches to ensure your rosehip oil is the freshest possible product. Due to the fragile nature of what is pure unrefined rosehip oil, this is important. Our product does not sit in some warehouse for months or even years before being shipped out. Important notice since we produce only enough rosehip oil to keep up with demand occasionally we sell out. If sold out please be patient, we promise it will be worth the wait .
feature_bullets: POWERFUL REJUVINATING PROPERTIES. Proven extremely effective at treating sun damaged skin, age spots, scars, dermatitis, eczema, psoriasis, dry flakey skin, wrinkles, dandruff, dry hair, brittle nails. Rosehip oil has long been a Hollywood secret only recently making it to the mainstream. Try adding Skin Daily Pure Rosehip Oil to your mascara for noticeably (As in your friends will be asking) thicker and longer lashes in just weeks.
COLD PRESSED GOODNESS. Oil is cold processed ensuring the freshest most pure, potent, and beneficial product.

PRODUCED IN MICRO-BATCHES. Skin Daily's Rosehip oil is pressed and bottled in small micro batches. This ensures we produce only enough rosehip oil to keep up with demand. Eliminating the possibility of our oil sitting idle and going stale in some warehouse. Our 1 oz bottle makes the perfect 1 month supply of super fresh Rosehip oil. Beware of large "bargain" bottles as the oil often goes stale long before the oil can be used.

PREMIUM AMBER GLASS BOTTLE W/DROPPER. Our tinted glass bottle keeps your product fresh. Exposure to prolonged light will dramatically reduce the effectiveness of this fragile but highly effective oil. Dropper ensures just the right amount....a little goes a long way.
